subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Pocono Raceway will again play host to not one but two 500-mile Nextel Cup races in 2008, no matter how much grumbling from drivers about how interminable 500-mile races seem to be at Pocono.
snippet: Pocono Raceway will again play host to not one but two 500-mile Nextel Cup races in 2008, no matter how much grumbling from drivers about how interminable 500-mile races seem to be at Pocono.
